scripts.prepare: cd posts && npm i && cd  ../comments && npm i && cd ../moderation && npm i && cd ../query && npm i && cd ../event-bus && npm i && cd ../client && npm i && cd .. && echo "Done installing!"
scripts.build:images: cd posts && docker build -t arrigolupori/posts . && cd  ../comments && docker build -t arrigolupori/comments . && cd ../moderation && docker build -t arrigolupori/moderation . && cd ../query && docker build -t arrigolupori/query . && cd ../event-bus  && docker build -t arrigolupori/event-bus . && cd ../client && docker build -t arrigolupori/client . && cd .. && echo "Done creating images!"
scripts.push:images: docker push arrigolupori/posts && docker push arrigolupori/comments && docker push arrigolupori/moderation && docker push arrigolupori/query && docker push arrigolupori/event-bus && docker push arrigolupori/client && echo "Done pushing images!"
scripts.apply:k8s: cd infra/k8s && kubectl apply -f . && cd ../.. && echo "Done applying k8s configs!"
